ygData.subject: Re: [EQ_Tinkering] Digest Number 289
ygData.msgSnippet: You can t honestly tell me this!!  The damn fireworks have been coded to be stacked already!!  When made, they are stacked 4 at a time on the pointer.  It
ygData.messageBody:
You can't honestly tell me this!! The damn fireworks have been coded to be
stacked already!! When made, they are
stacked 4 at a time on the pointer. It should not be that hard to code in a
hook to make them stackable in inventory.

Ghirardelli
----- Original Message -----
From: <jbuckingham@...>
To: <EQ_Tinkering@egroups.com>
Sent: Thursday, June 22, 2000 4:04 PM
Subject: Re: [EQ_Tinkering] Digest Number 289


>
> > Stackable fireworks
>
> They've already amde a statement on this, in regard to stackable potions
> for alchemy.
> Aparently, the properties of "right-click activatable" and "stackable" are
> mututally exclusive.
>
> Besides, you really wouldn't want them to try.. Ask a newbie Iksar shaman
> what happened when they tried to make
> normal old mosquito wings stackable - they were out of the game for 2
weeks
> :)
>
>
